overview_summary: All three neighboring landowners are held under personal revocable trusts named for individuals, indicating private family ownership of the parcels. There is no public record of any organizational structure or stated stance on development for these trusts. Their community influence appears limited, as they are not known to hold notable positions or larger enterprises in the area.
